name: Enable Labs
description:
Enable Labs builds professional grade, custom enterprise software as well as web and mobile applications using Agile Development practices with Ruby on Rails. Owned and operated by Mark Menard along with help from John Fitzpatrick and a continually growing crew of developers and support staff that passionately seek to bring your web- and mobile-based ideas from concept to deployment.
We do pair-programming in a test-driven development (TDD) and behavioral driven development (BDD) environment. In addition, we offer on-site mentoring services for client-developers, so that your development team is properly equipped to maintain and update your source code after we've reached project completion. Otherwise, we offer on-going maintenance so you don't have to worry about maintaining your source code and are able to focus on the marketing and management aspects of your businesses.
